Activity: Check emails, review yesterday's work, and plan the day's tasks. Listen to some upbeat music to get energized.
Present the resource system UI and visual effects designs to the team (@lpro-1 and @cdev-1). Gather feedback and incorporate suggestions. Be open to new ideas and improvements.

Begin brainstorming concept art for special abilities and power-ups. Generate a list of possible abilities that fit the game's mechanics and themes. Think about visual cues for each ability. Consider the power budget for each ability to maintain game balance.
Sketch rough thumbnails for each special ability, focusing on visual clarity and impact. Iterate on the designs based on team feedback. Consider color palettes and visual style consistency.
Lunch break. Play some online chess.
Refine the chosen concept art for the special abilities. Create detailed sketches and color studies. Prepare a presentation to get the team to review.
Present concept art to the team, gather feedback. Refine based on feedback from team members.
Prepare updated concept art to be passed to art team.
